name: react-native-ios-context-menu
description: A react-native component to use context menu's (UIMenu) on iOS 13/14+

scripts.typescript:all: yarn run typescript ; yarn run typescript-example
scripts.clean: del-cli android/build example/android/build example/android/app/build example/ios/build lib
scripts.reopen:ios: yarn run close:ios ; yarn run open:ios
scripts.build:update-version: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/-.*//') ; cd example/ios ; agvtool new-marketing-version $PACKAGE_VERSION ; xcrun agvtool next-version -all ; cd ../..
scripts.build: yarn run build:js ; yarn run build:ios ; yarn run build:docs
scripts.build:js: yarn run lint ; yarn run typescript ; yarn run bob build
scripts.build:ios:
cd ./example/ios ; BUILD_INFO=$(xcodebuild -project ./*.xcodeproj -showBuildSettings -list -json | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '
') ; SCHEME_NAME=$(node -pe 'JSON.parse(process.argv[1]).project.schemes[0]' $BUILD_INFO) ; xcodebuild -workspace *.xcworkspace -scheme $SCHEME_NAME -destination 'generic/platform=iOS'
scripts.run:release: cd example && npx react-native run-ios --configuration Release
scripts.run:debug: cd example && npx react-native run-ios --configuration Debug
scripts.build-and-run: yarn run build && yarn run run:debug && yarn run run:release
scripts.pod-install: cd example/ios && bundle install ; RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install ; cd ../.. ; yarn run nuke:example-pods-env ; yarn run build:update-version
scripts.pod-install:old: cd example/ios && RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=0 pod install ; cd ../.. ; yarn run nuke:example-pods-env ; yarn run build:update-version
scripts.pod-install:reopen: yarn run close:ios ; yarn run pod-install ; yarn run open:ios
scripts.pod-install:reopen-old: yarn run close:ios ; yarn run pod-install:old ; yarn run open:ios
scripts.nuke:example-pods: cd example/ios ; pod cache clean --all ; rm -rfv ./Pods ./build ./Podfile.lock ; cd ../..
scripts.nuke:all: yarn run nuke:node-modules ; yarn run nuke:example-pods ;  yarn run nuke:example-pods-env
scripts.update-dep: yarn add react-native-ios-utilities --dev ; cd example ; yarn add react-native-ios-utilities ; cd ..
scripts.update-dep:next: yarn add react-native-ios-utilities@next --dev ; cd example ; yarn add react-native-ios-utilities@next ; cd ..
scripts.update-dep:pods: cd example/ios ; pod install --repo-update ; pod update DGSwiftUtilities ContextMenuAuxiliaryPreview ; cd ../.. ; yarn run build:update-version
scripts.initialize:js: yarn install ; cd example ; yarn install ; cd ..
scripts.initialize:reset: yarn run nuke:all && yarn run initialize

author: Dominic Go <dominic@dominicgo.dev> (https://github.com/dominicstop)
